content.detailedDescription:
I am a young adult who stays with my parents 2 nights a week when i attend nursing school in my former hometown. i had fallen asleep watching tv on my parent's couch in the living room and my mom had fallen asleep in the recliner beside me. i am a good sleeper and will usually sleep through the night regardless of the circumstances of my sleeping environment (i.E. tv/lights on, on the couch, etc.). on this particular night, i awoke seemingly without reason and was craving a cigarette. i am a light smoker and have been trying to quit since i am pursuing a career in the healthcare industry so this struck me as a bit odd but i went outside anyways. 
it had been storming all evening so i was surprised when i went outside to see a beautifully clear night. the moon was full and very bright. my parents live on the outskirts of a small city so the light pollution is pretty nonexistent. i was checking out all the stars i don't get to see in the considerably larger city i live in an hour away. as i was admiring the stars, i noticed a red light approaching. 
i have been employed as a flight attendant for 5 years and have been dating/living with an airline pilot for 4 of those years so while i do not consider myself an aviation expert, i am admittedly more knowledgeable than the general population when it comes to flying objects. for example, i am aware that the aircraft that i work on is approximately 103 feet long, has a wingspan of 85 feet, and usually cruises around 35,000 ft. my favorite aviation quote comes from da vinci: "for once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return." i am familiar with the configurations of the right-of-way lights (red on left wingtip, green on right wingtip), the aft white navigation light, and the white strobes that accompany all of these positions and these strobes are normally used in poor weather conditions for the avoidance of air collisions or sometimes just because the flight deck crew feel like having them on. what i saw was not a commercial airliner or any other aircraft that is required to have the red/green light configuration which narrows down the likelihood of this being the case to almost nothing. 
the red light continued due southwest which would eventually put it directly overhead eventually if it stayed on its current course. i ran inside and woke my mom up so i wouldn't have to witness this alone. the light approaching was very large and was not the traditional red color you would see on a familiar aircraft; the best analogy i can come up with is the blood return from a vein. dark, deep, demure red. as if that wasn't ominous enough, the other lights on the underbelly of the fuselage started to come into view. the large red light seemed to be centered in the middle of the craft which was triangular in shape. there was another red light at the leading point of the triangle: same shade of red but smaller by about half. along the starboard and port edges of the craft were 4 white lights running forward to aft. they were not quite in line with the red light at the point as may be expected. there weren't any lights running along the aft base of the triangle which made it hard to discern the exact line of this part of the craft.  
the fuselage itself was an flat ink black so its lines easily melted into the night sky. the overall outline of the craft was discernible due to the underbelly lights and to the barely visible outline of the craft. the red lights were solid and only slightly pulsating. the 8 white lights were strobing in various sequences and at varying brightness. they were running on and off like the lights on a runway and then they would slow down a bit and flash on and off at random at sometimes individually and sometimes in pairs and sometimes altogether. it made no noise and had a wispy short tail coming off its aft. this is depicted in the sketch provided.
the craft is traveling at an altitude of approximately 15,000-20,000 feet, and at a speed that would seem to make the concept of lift completely irrelevant to the flight of this craft. the airplane i work on achieves lift at around 150 knots during takeoff and must gain some speed to maintain that lift. i have no idea how fast this craft was traveling; i do know that it remained visible in my parent's backyard sky traveling in a straight line and sometimes standing still or hovering for 15 minutes. i know this because i made a point to look at the clock before returning with my mom outside in case we had any lost time. while the craft was hovering it remained completely still and maintained its altitude. 
my mom and i had a had a birds eye view of this ufo. we had no doubt as to what we were viewing. i was scared, awestruck, frozen in place, and dumbfounded as to how serendipitous it was that i got to be outside as the craft passed over my parent's house. i felt the sensation of being watched by a formidable intelligence. i felt out completely bested by it on all levels really. knowing that is where the fear came from. the object hung around the back yard and just kind of mosied on through the sky to go over the roof of the house. my mom and i ran through the house to the front door and it was still on its southwest course but it was ascending a bit and accelerating a bit more. it went behind the trees and that was the end of the ordeal.
to be perfectly honest, this is not the first time something like this has happened to my mom, myself, and some of my other family members. nevertheless, i am still left incredulous after events like this. i feel less in control of my life when the presence of these things are reaffirmed for me. i sketched a drawing of the craft the morning after the sighting with the help of my mom. i am not an artist by any means but it gets the general idea across. i may one day have the gumption to share the rest of my experiences but as you can probably tell, i am long winded and short on spare time being a nursing student working almost full time. i had to make the time for this account. i just felt like telling some people who may "believe" me and maybe feel like they aren't alone in their own experience. they-whatever they may be-are very real and not a figment of your imagination. lets just hope that at best they want to enrich our human existence and at worst they're indifferent to us primal and uninteresting beings. 
thank you for reading and the best to all of you.
content.summary: Very visible perfectly clear night large silent sporadic lights triangle fuselage solid center dark red light silent very slow hovering at times wispy short emission

content.detailedDescription:
Walking out of local retail establishment, heading for my car. stepped outside the doors, and two other people were standing there, looking up, talking. i looked up, and saw the object they had been observing for several minutes. 
they thought perhaps it was a remote control craft. i thought so at first, but the longer i watched, the less it became apparent. 
the object hovered overhead. no sound. it held its position without dropping altitude or any corrections at all. there were four lights--two green and two red, with the red flashing to white and back to red over and over. 
after several moments of just hovering, it turned round a couple of times before rising in altitude and taking off toward the northwest. 
i went around the corner of the building, and watched it take off like as streak before it disappeared. 
surprised when i saw it. a bit of a sense of dread, disbelief. but i did watch and tried to track it when it took off. 
i lost sight of the object when it took off.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Walked outside of retail establishment, looked up, and there it was.

content.detailedDescription: I was in new jersey for my fathers wedding. my sister left the rehearsal dinner for a while and my father was concerned. i left the dinner to go back to the house on the same street. i started running. it was a breezy and cool night, with clouds but they were moving very fast. almost as soon as i stepped out of the restaurant this big orb appeared in the sky. it continued moving from north to south at an oddly smooth pace. too big to be a star, unlike any shooting star i've ever seen. too smooth to be a meteor or satellite or anything. it continued across the sky and half way across disappeared behind the thin cloud cover. at first i was flabbergasted at what i saw. i got this weird feeling after it happened and the weather seemed to synchronize with the event (wind). a few days later i was describing the event to a friend in the same town and him and his father saw the same exact thing! the father swears on it being a ufo. i want to believe, but i still have my doubts.
content.summary: Big white orb with small reddish tail moved smoothly and quickly across the sky and disappeared into the clouds. weird feeling after occurrence, others in town also witnessed.

content.detailedDescription:
I am making this report for a friend of mine who wishes to remain anonymous.  while talking to her on the phone today she asked me what the light in the sky was last night.  i asked her where she saw it and she said in the vicinity of russel, ny.  in as much as there are about 20 miles between my location and hers i pointed out that i had not noticed it.

upon questioning her about the incident the following is what i was told:

she was closing the attached garage door to her house (we both live in rural areas with few neighbors) when she noticed a glowing object which appeared to her as a plate would look if she were looking directly at the top or bottom of.  i asked if it looked like a ball and she agreed that it could have.  she heard no sound that she could associate with the object; however, while observing it she heard and saw an airplane's tail strobe and red port side wingtip light but could not distinguish the fuselage in the dark.  the aircraft she could hear the engine/prop sounds of and assumed (likely correctly) that it was a smallish turboprop commercial aircraft heading towards the ogdensburg, ny airport.  although it did not cross directly between her and the glowing object she had the impression that the glowing object was much farther from her than the aircraft.  the aircraft was heading north west and the glowing object was stationary nearly due north of her location.  when i asked her about relative sizes i asked her to reference the size of the plane and the object relative to the apparent size of the moon.  her estimation/guess was that the distance between the lights of the airplane were about 1/4 of the width of the moon.  her similar guess about the object was that it was about 3/4 of the width of the moon.  using the conventional 20/20 visual acuity resolution capability of 1 arc minute if her estimate of the apparent distance between the running light and the strobe of 1/4 of 30(arc minute size of moon) = 7.5arc min and estimating the distance between running lights and tail strobe at 20-25 feet we can approximate the distance to the plane using the approximate small angle formula s(dist to plane) = (length of plane)/tan(of apparent angle) or s = 22.5feet/tan(7.5/60) and s = 22.5/.002182 = (10313ft) or very close to 2 statute miles which seems reasonable.  therefore if her estimate of the airplane is reasonable then we can presume that her estimate of the angular size of the object was a reasonable guess and her estimate that it was farther away than the airplane is also a reasonable estimate on her part. using the above equation again and solving for size of the object assuming it was 2miles away we find: size obj = (2x5280ft)(tan(22.5/60)) = approx 69ftdia. any multiples of 2 miles will increase the diameter by such multiple. her impression was that it was much farther away than the airplane and somehow gave her the impression that it was large. at 10 miles it would have been about 345/350ftdia.

she watched it from the front of her garage for about 10 minutes then went in the house and closed the garage door. she then checked to see if it was there periodically about every 10-15 minutes from her front porch. after two or three checks during which she saw it, she looked for it and it had vanished. as far as she could determine it never moved from the initial position in which she observed it.
content.summary: Closing garage door noticed light in sky watched for several minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was exiting my apartment building on the morning of oct. 4, 2014 at approximately 7:32 a.M. standing outside of building when i looked up to see a conventional airplane flying overhead in a westerly direction. the plane was clearly visible at medium height from ground, then as it continued west i first saw the object moving in a south by southeast direction. it was a very light grey to almost white color and ovoid in shape. as i was preparing to enter a friend's car, i immediately pointed in an upward direction towards the object in hopes my friend (who was driving) might also see it. by the time i was about to enter the car i lost sight of the object and my friend did not see it at all. the object was traveling in a straight path, unwavering, for the entire time it was in view. my first thought was that it was a ufo since i could not possibly identify it and it did not appear to be in any way connected to the plane i first observed. since my friend never saw the object she simply scoffed at my mentioning i had just witnessed a ufo. i've had a keen interest in the subject of ufo's for well over 50 years, and while i am highly skeptical of the eth, i continue to believe research and investigation is warranted and feel all reports should be made to proper organizations. i must admit it was an interesting and somewhat exciting experience. thank you for your work and your consideration of this incident.
content.summary: Witnessed low flying plane heading west, then noticed object heading s-se

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son let our dog's out around 7:30-8pm and i looked up into the sky and saw 3 white objects not blinking and not along any known flight path 90 degrees in the sky moving in a triangle formation from east to west.  also noticed a few more objects one moving from area near the 3 in triangle formation and it headed ne.  two others were moving in the same direction but much  further apart and one shot across the sky from a westward direction to a southerly direction in a mere few seconds.  i have seen satellites move across the sky but they go from west to east and they follow behind each other in this area.  we heard no noise and saw no blinking lights just them as white objects like the stars themselves.  we live near chaumont,ny in jefferson county, ny.
content.summary: 3 white objects in triangle formation moving across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on a trip to tucson , az and about 6 miles south of clovis , nm i pulled over to take a picture of the sunset and that's when i seen the object sitting at the bottom of the cloud . the only thing around is a chemical plant and it looked like it was hovering close to it . not really sure the distance of the object but the chemical plant is about 2 miles from the hwy . when i seen the object , i was happy but shocked . i have seen strange things in the sky before but this is the only one i got a picture of . i watched the object for about 30 mins. and then it just vanished . clovis , nm is about 100 miles north of roswell , nm .
content.summary: Object sitting in cloud .

content.detailedDescription: Me and my 13 year old daughter got up at 4 to watch the lunar blood moon on october 8th 2014. sometime shortly after 5 we were stargazing and we just happen to look up at the little dipper and i was explaining it to her. just then we both saw a object fly over. it had no noise what so ever. it was very large.It moved very very fast. maybe twice the speed of normal airline jet craft. it was all black yet it had red dim lights about it like red lights you would use to still have night vision. however it appeared shadowed as if to conceal it somehow. it was boomerang shaped with maybe a slight w shape. we never heard it, in fact if you were not looking directly into the path of this thing you never would notice it. it appeard cloacked. we just stood there with our mouths hanging open, then ran back inside to tell my husband what he had just missed. i have seen 3 other anomolies in the night sky, but this left me feeling weird like i had just seen something not of this world.
content.summary: Awesome

content.detailedDescription:
The object was small, about the size of a soccer ball or basketball. it was a dark mass that held a shape that had no sharp corners and yet wasn’t round. it possessed a unique color that seemed to mimic camouflage, but each shade of brown, gray and black was unique to certain protrusions or forms this object held. 
there were no lights on it. it moved from about 50 feet above the neighborhood street, over the line of homes and into the fields to the east of the homes where i lost sight of it. its movement was slow, smooth, steady, and yet at certain times it would change, dipping down and then to one side or the other, never changing its orientation or “facing” direction. there was one section that did protrude further than the rest and it was this section that was always facing the direction of travel. 
there were no sounds from this object and due to the calm weather it would’ve been easy, at that small distance, to hear any sounds. the total time of observation wasn’t more than 15-20 seconds.
content.summary: Low, slow moving small object.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello 
i had just got back home at 1.30am , i always look up to the stars for a few minutes if the sky is clear ,after spotting a ufo about 20 years ago over kenilworth ,united kingdom  of which the next day it was reported on the news that several people over warwickshire had spotted something unusual .
as i was about to enter my house last night  i thought i saw a meteorite , so i carried on looking south east for a few moments and then i couldn't believe what i just seeing , it was like the recent serbia  meteor with an intense bright light shooting towards kenilworth , then three orbs appeared and moved around like no other man made object then the orbs came together and proceeded towards waverley rd , then i lost sight . they looked exactly like the orbs spotted over london quite recently
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright shooting star light splits into 3 orbs

content.detailedDescription: While snapping photos of lunar eclipse noticed the same object in two different positions.
content.summary: Pictures taken during lunar eclipse

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were sitting on the terrace of our home. then i noticed a white glowing orb goinh from se to sw. first i thought that it was a helicopter. but suddenly i realised that it was making no sound. so it could not be a helicopter. then i thought that it was a meteorite. but it did not fell anywhere. it was moving in a zig-zag manner. it was like up and down.
content.summary: My mother and i were sitting on the terrace. then only i saw a white glowing orb of light. first thought that it was a helicopter then i realized that it was making no sound then i thought that it could be a meteorite but it wasnt .It was movingzigzag

content.detailedDescription: I was done watching the broncos game and i went out my front door and something caught my eye just above the house across the street, it was a black object and i called my room mate to come out and see this very odd looking thing in the sky, she said that she saw it, i pointed up to the object and yelled at everyone on my block to look up and see this,two guys across the street looked up and saw it, they ran over to where i was and we watched it for about twenty min., we noticed it had little red lights on the bottom and two bright white lights in the front, it moved real slow right over us and we watched several planes fly close to it,a 737 was passing right by it maybe 600 yards and it blinked its lights twice right next to it,i know that pilot saw it.The object slowly moved nw and slowly moved straight up untill it vanished.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While we watched this object pass over head, a737 was heading into dia blinked its lights as it was right next to it.

content.detailedDescription: I had gotten up to use the bathroom and upon returning to bed at approx. 0200 hrs, i stopped to look out my bedroom window. i noticed that there was overcast when suddenly, a cylinder shape of light travelling ne streaked across the sky. there was absolutely no sound and went a fast as you can drop your pointed finger from a bent at the elbow straight up to a downward position to a straight head pointed position! we live not too far from an airport and passenger jets constantly fly over my house! they are noisy and slow moving across the sky! this was maybe 1000 to 2000 ft up and either in or above the overcast. at first i thought it was a high beam search light (like to attract people to a carnival or sale of some kind) and waited for it to come around again, but after several minutes, i realized that that's what it wasn't! i worked the graveyard shift outdoors for many years and was always looking for ufo's but never did see anything unusual. this was approx. 1/4 inch wide by 3 inches long looking up at it from my position on the ground. i'm a former us paratrooper and retired police officer!
content.summary: Obsd streak of light in or above overcast moving faster than any known aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving to massachusetts  he told me  that new york skyline was on my side  i started shooting pictures through open window  i  have never seen  new york  only on tv  and was excited i don't travel much,  i thought  it was a plane  continued to shoot  pictures  of the new york skyline  also  had taken pictures  upon getting on the bridge . when i returned home and was looking at the pictures on my laptop is when i realized  it was totally something else i enlarged  the pictures  and that's how i came about that it looks like diamond shape and round. i checked information on my canon rebel xt time was 16:56 to 17:05 which is when we entered the bridge. i also noticed a shape in the water i'm not sure if this is anything or not or if the pictures i have are that is why i'm sending   6 pictures.  i would like to thank you for looking  at pictures and letting me know what they are pictures of and what you think.          


                    sincerely
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: My husband and i were driving to massachusetts he told me manhattan was on my side iso i started shooting pictures

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were taking a ride to chehalis, washington from the olympia area via i-5.  it was around noon on october 6, 2014.  i was in awe at how beautiful the weather was and was leaning forward, looking out the front window.  at first i saw a somewhat shiny object that appeared to be in the shape of a boomerang almost like this " ) " and straight up and down as illustrated by the parenthesis....I thought i was seeing things, and at first thought it might be an airplane.  it was well above 500 feet in elevation and it did not move. i kept watching it to see if it was going to head toward seatac airport, instead it simply disappeared.  i never saw it again.  i had just started to point it out to my husband and he said he couldn't look because he was driving.  i told him, "i think i just saw a ufo."  i'm pretty familiar with aircraft as i am retired from boeing and knew about several of the prototypes.  this did not appear to be a plane at all.
content.summary: Poss. ufo sighted over chehalis, wa.

content.detailedDescription: Close to i60 going east to la seem to be hoovering far away but looked very big and had a soft white glow underneath i was driving so i could not stop the large craft made me notice it .I lost the object with trees and bridges  it seem to be very low.
content.summary: Felt a little rushed

content.detailedDescription:
As a private pilot, i was flying from moosonee, ontario, back home to oshawa, ontario, in the very early hours of june 5th, 2005.  my routing was taking me via north bay flying at a height of 8,500’.  weather was clear & calm, but, far to the west, there was a line of thunderstorms that were at least 75kms away.  i was flying a cessna 172 with 2 passengers on board.  at approximately 1.30am, about 40kms north of lake abitibi, out of nowhere, there was a very bright light about the size of half a full moon.  the light was so bright, i could easily read my map in the cockpit.  it was at the same flight level as me but i could not tell how far away it was and i could not see any fuselage or particular shape.  i got on the pilot to pilot radio (126.7) and followed standard contact procedure requesting the other “pilot” to inform me of their height, equipment and direction of travel.  after several attempts, no communication was made (which is not unusual).  the object seemed to be holding the same spot for a couple of minutes before rapidly moving off to my port, then starboard side while maintaining the same height.  failing to get any response on 126.7, i radioed london (ontario) radar who controlled the airspace i was in.  after identifying myself with a transponder code, they could not see any other object anywhere close to me.  they suggested i conduct a 90% turn to the east and observe what the object does.  the object followed me, occasionally changing its position from directly in front, the sides and on one occasion, to the rear – each time, it moved at seemingly impossible speeds.  london radar checked with the military who confirmed that they did not have anything going on in the region.  this went on for approximately 20 minutes before the object seemingly went vertical until it disappeared completely.

throughout all this time, there was never any interference with my radios or navigation equipment.  after the incident was over, one of my passengers (sitting in the back) whom i thought was sleeping (as was my front passenger), asked if i thought it was an alien craft – he was terrified!!!  he was also a non-believer but admitted he could not find any logical explanation for what happened.  the flight continued on without further incident.

i did file a report with transport canada immediately on my arrival in oshawa later that same day.  several months later, they sent me a letter (which i no longer have!) that stated they could not find any logical explanation for the incident and put it down to unusual weather phenomenon.

lake abitibi and north is extremely isolated.  there are no roads or communities.  the terrain is very flat (pre-arctic tundra).  why an “alien” craft would be in that area beats me?

london radar (transport canada) should have the full transcript of the event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Unidentified very bright white light, same height as my aircraft (8,500') without radar trace.

content.detailedDescription: I enjoy going out and watching the space station go overhead. i get emails when it is going to pass over. i got one tonight and went out. nice clear night. great for viewing. it (the space station) comes into view out of the west and as i'm watching it another light appears just north of it crossing it's path. from the new light's trajectory it was clearly above or farther away. it shoots across about half of my sky view super fast. much faster than the space station (which itself is moving very fast across my viewing area) like shooting star fast. but it is perfectly even, not twinkling like a shooting star and no tail. then it stops dead and just disappeared. i considered the fact that it could be a satellite but it was brighter/bigger and of course satellites do not stop.
content.summary: Fast light crossing path of iss stopped and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my front steps looking south when i observed a solid blue orb ascending straight up rapidly. it appeared to slow just before it stopped and hovered in place for about two minutes, as i waited to see what it was going to do, it suddenly began to descend the same path until it was out of sight. my house sits at a higher altitude than the city south of me so it eventually dropped behind the houses on my block. there is one of those red light towers south of me by fullerton airport, i believe, and i was able to use this light tower as a marker for position in the sky, yet i have no way of knowing the orbs exact placement due to the distance from my house. i waited about 15-20 minutes to see if it would show again, but it did not.

i easily noticed the object as looking for unusual things in the sky is a regular practice of mine. i look up often, my first sighting occurred in 1976 and i have never stopped looking up. i have seen many unusual things over my life, i have only felt fear with the initial sighting.
content.summary: Blue orb ascended-hovered-descended

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting near the window taking random picutres of the cloud cover,when i looked at theese pictures i found a strange light glowing right next to the sun , it appeared in three pictures all taken at 14:47 at three different positions which could not have been a flight path .
at first it was going sw  in the first picture and appeared as white light.
in the second picture it was to the right and was red in colour

in the third picture it was far south and again turned white
content.summary: Glowing object parallel to the sun. strange path. change of colour

content.detailedDescription: Saw what appeared to be a bright planet, but it was moving. from the south, slowly north. we were facing east. it was a bright ball. no tail, no colored lights. we thought it might be a plane headlights but it was heading away from us. we thought briefly it was coming at us instead of moving away. jokingly i waved at it and said hey!! then it abruptly i swear moved very fast in the other direction and appeared to climb and disappear in 4seconds. didn't even think to get a picture.
content.summary: To bright to be a star, or a plane. no colored lights. appeared to hover and then abruptly headed nw disappeared in about 4 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Walked out on my deck and looked up to the west because there was a very bright star i didn't recognize. this was 8:35 pm est. noticed that it was moving. as it came nearer i noticed the seperate lights, of which there were many. they were very bright and during the time i watched it the lights all went off and back on 3 times. the craft was very long and thin. the way the lights were arranged it seemed to have a slight diamond shape. very high altitude and headed almost due east. there was no sound at all. i followed it's path until it went out of sight. it seemed to be moving faster than a commerical jet. then entire thing lasted for about 2-3 minutes. i tried to take a photo but my tablet couldn't zoom in enough. my reaction was "this cool" weather was clear with a full moon.
content.summary: First thought it was a star then saw all the lights followed path until craft disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Bj and i were driving home from grocery store.  we'd been watching the moon rise.  traveling on hwy 21 north, past gary job corp and the little local airport, where two sherrif vehicles were scanning along road to south with their spot lights on.

i was looking out the passengers window at the moon and lower in the sky than the moon a flashing light caught my eye.  it was quite far away, seemed triangular and had long lengths of white blinking lights.  i did not see any red or green lights.  it was stationary it seemed as we drove closer and then past it.  

it's position did not shift or appear to travel.  i viewed it for about five minutes.  it did not approach the airport from my sight.  there is mostly farm and ranch land in this area and scattered houses. 

bj driving saw it and thought it might have been a helicopter.  i rolled down the window and did not hear helicopter noises.
content.summary: Triangular looking object hovering with long white blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what to think of these pics.  i was observing sunbow (rainbow around sun) just before sunset this evening.  i took pics with my iphone and noticed orb in picture.  it's location varies throughtout a series of 6 pics but the third of 7 pics shows no orb.  my daughter was driving home and was about 10 miles away, took a pic around the same time, through the car window and the pic shows the same orb.  i don't know what to think or if it could be an optical anomaly  created by the lens.  i would be glad to fwd pics to mufon if you are interested.  these orbs are perfectly spherical and not anything unusual except that they are there and move, and appear in pics from two different iphones from different locations.    i'll have to upload pics if you are interested.  orb size and distance are hard to determine.  maybe it's an iphone abberation, except that it moves and in one pic is not there, and two different iphones recorded it from different location.
content.summary: Orb observed in iphone pics afterwards

content.detailedDescription: i was shown a picture on my sisters phone, that she took in 2012.  she was driving and a storm appeared out of nowhere.  she called my mom and her husband asking if there was anything on radar.  they reported no.  she started taking pictures of the storm with her cell phone.  she was hanging it out the window and just snapping shots as she drove.  my nephew was with her.  the storm was fast and powerful, she ended up having to throw my nephew in the ditch and covering him.  she then took pics of all the damage done by the storm.  she was at home telling the story of the storm, when her husband noticed a very clear picture of  disk like objects with a flame under them lifting off.  they have since returned and have seen nothing to show it was anything but a ufo.  i just saw this picture today, and can't believe they have never shown me it.  i took it and put it on my computer, but i am leery of sending it to anyone.  i know it could be worth money when they test it and say its a real pic.  i am a former veteran for 12 years, a police officer for over 2 years, and i now do security for federal buildings.  i have a secret security clearance for my job.  i am no crack pot nor am i a liar.  i am unsure what my next step is in this process hope you can help me.  i will show the pic to an investigator in person. like i said i am leery of what to do with the pic. my sister is poor and could use the money, but i am an enthusiastic person about this.  i knew it had to be shared.  please just send someone to look at it, and i promise you wont regret it.  thank you
content.summary: Great pic of what i can only see as being a ufo.  clearest ive ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on a overcast afternoon and saw what appeared to be a small dark cloud moving across the sky. i then realized that it was moving way too fast for the wind speed and the thick cloud cover above it was stationary. in an instant the cloud seemed to stop and condense itself into a sphere. it changed from a darker grey color to a bright white/transparent. it then flew directly at me and did and abrupt 180 degree arcing turn too sharp for any other thing i have ever seen in the sky.  it moved away at an extremely high rate of speed, gaining altitude until it reached the cloud cover and burned or pushed the clouds out of the way disappearing. it left a distinct arcing shape cut in the clouds. due this object's transparent/mist-like nature it would very easy for it to travel unnoticed.  it made me wonder if what i saw was some type of invisibility cloaking technology.
content.summary: Cloud like ufo materialized

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were enjoying a bonfire.  i recorded the orbs moving in a straight line.  they flickered out all(4) in the exact spot.  i recorded the last 3 flying overhead moving north west.  i can submit cell phone video.  the time from my video was 10:19pm 8/23/14.
content.summary: Red/orange orbs moving in straight line formation.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving north on park square drive when i looked northwest into the sky.  an either reflective or brightly glowing metallic silver/grey cigar/saucer shaped (i coudn't tell) thing was sitting stationary in the sky.  i stopped to watch after it struck me as odd and 3 to 4 seconds later it disappeared, accelerating very quickly to the northeast.  i was in disbelief.
content.summary: Spotted reflective object over airplane crash site.  accelerated and disappeared to ne.

content.detailedDescription: Working in orem doing solar on a roof and took pictures of the morning sun later on i found these balls of light  in the photo and zoom in and was surprised on what i seen
content.summary: A ball of light
